description: Author's description: A commonsense explanation of Christianity, including the hard questions, for normal parents and others who find church teachings weird or unhelpful. The book sets out three simple principles that can be used to make sense of prayer, grace, salvation, sin, etc., and then applies these principles in suggesting ways to deal with the problems and temptations we all face in our lives. It is designed to help in raising children who will feel confident in their values, stand by their convictions, and be successful spouses and human beings.
author: Matthew Fortunato
